name: Michael Johnson
content: Michael Johnson Michael Johnson Faculty of Science and EngineeringMacquarie University 2109AUSTRALIA Email michael.johnson@mq.edu.au Position Emeritus Professor of Mathematics and Computer Science Offices Chair, The Seoul Accord 2019-2023 Chair of the The Australian Computer Society Disciplinary Committee 2023- Board Director -- Professional Standards, The Australian Computer Society 2011-2015, 2017-2022 Professor in Engineering, SECedu UNSW, 2024- Founding Scientific Director, The Optus Macquarie University Cyber Security Hub, 2016-2017 Foundation Director of The Macquarie-DET ICT Innovations Centre 2002-2012 Room No. 4RPD 215 Telephone +61-2-9850-9514 Fax +61-2-9850-9551 Links to Brief biography Recent Publications Selected Older Publications Teaching Postgraduate Research Students Other Interests Information for Potential Research Students Copyright Â© 1988-2026, Michael Johnson.
